description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTRotavirus for IMMZ.D2.DT.Rotavirus. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a rotavirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: IMMZ.D2.DT.Rotavirus
